title: 2 Bedroom 2 Full Bath Condo for Rent
posting_body: Downstairs condo off of Craig Rd & Lamb Blvd.
Master bedroom has its own bathroom.
This condo has new carpet & paint, new kitchen countertops & new bathroom sinks with vanities.
Living room has built in fireplace.
Unit also has a covered patio.
The complex is gated & security on property.
You will have your own covered parking space, a pool key & mailbox key.
Monthly rent is $1,400.00 due on the 1st of every month.
* 1st month's rent; Last month's rent; Security deposit
